projects.name: Mobile Number based Data Encryption in Edge-Cloud Computing (MDEECC)
projects.description: I have accomplished the practical eectiveness of integrating advanced encryption, specically AES-256, within a distributed computing framework. The study demonstrates the pivotal role of this encryption standard in bolstering data transmission security across mobile devices, edge servers, and cloud servers.

projects.name: Building Fully Fledged Website
projects.description: I have accomplished a fully functional website during a full-stack internship, utilizing React for the front end and Node.js for the back end. Achieved responsive design, ecient data management, and seamless user experience. Contributed actively to version control and collaborative development processes.

projects.name: SQL Injection
projects.description: Developed an SQL Injection testing tool designed to identify SQL vulnerabilities in web applications. This tool automates the process of detecting SQL injection points ,contributing to enhanced security measures and safeguarding sensitive data.
